detaileddescription.para: A vector of vec3 values: finalPositions. The final positions of the particle.
A vector of vec4 values: finalColors. The final colors of the particle.
A vector of float values: finalSizes. The final sizes of the particle.
A vector of float values: finalRotation. The final rotations of the particle.
A vector of vec3 values: positions. The positions of the particles.
A vector of vec3 values: velocities. The rotations of the particles.
A vector of float values: rotations. The rotations of the particles.
A vector of float values: AngularVelocities. The angular velocities of the particles.
A vector of vec4 values: startColors. The start colors of the particles.
A vector of float values: startSizes. The start sizes of the particles.
A vector of vec4 values: endColors. The end colors of the particles.
A vector of float values: endSizes. The end sizes of the particles.
A vector of float values: startTimes. The start times of the particles.
A float value: currentTime. The current Particle time in the particle system.
A float value: particleDuration. The duration of each particle.
A Texture pointer: texture. An instance of the texture of the particle.
A Mesh pointer: mesh. An instance of the mesh of the particle
A shader pointer:shader. An instance of the shader of the particle.
A vector of vec2: uvs. Empty, as it is not needed in 2D.
A vector of float: uvSize. Empty, as it is not needed in 2D.
A float value: timeScale. The time scale of the particle (default is 1).
A vec3 value: acceleration. The acceleration of the particle (default is vec3(0)).
An int value: particleIndex. The index of the particle
A vector of vec2 values: interpolationPoints_acceleration. The acceleration points to interpolate between
A vector of vec2 values: interpolationPoints_velocity. The velocity points to interpolate between
A vector of vec2 values: interpolationPoints_angularVelocity. The angular velocity points to interpolate between
A vector of vec2 values: interpolationPoints_color. The color points to interpolate between
A vector of vec2 values: interpolationPoints_size. The size points to interpolate between
An Interpolation value: interpolation_acceleration. The acceleration interpolation.
An Interpolation value: interpolation_velocity. The velocity interpolation.
An Interpolation value: interpolation_angularVelocity. The angular velocity acceleration interpolation.
An Interpolation value: interpolation_color. The color interpolation.
An Interpolation value: interpolation_size. The size interpolation.

Lerps from one color to the other, based on the float
start
a vec4 value, that is the start color
end
a vec4 value, that is the end color
t
a float value, that is the current lerp differentiater (between 0-1)
vec4, as the color between the two colors

Reserves space in all the arrays, and creates all the initial values
startup()

Shuts down the particle system, and deletes all the mesh and texture pointers
shutdown()

Starts the particle system, and initializes all the particles to their initial position
numParticles
an int value. The number of particles in the particle system.
particleDuration
a float value. Each particles duration.
texture
a Texture pointer. The texture of the particle (default is a white texture).
Shuts down the particle system, meaning that it clears all the values and paremeters of each particle

memberdef.argsstring: (vec3 position, vec3 velocity, float angle, float angularRotation, vec4 color, float size, vec4 endColor, float endSize)
memberdef.name: emit

detaileddescription.para:
Emits one particle with the properties inputted, has to be called multiple times, if more than one particle is neeeded.
position
a vec3 value. The position of the particle.
velocity
a vec3 value. The velocity of the particle.
angle
a float value. The angle of the particle.
angularRotation
a float value. The angular rotation of the particle.
color
a vec4 value. The start color of the particle.
size
a float value. The start size of the particle.
endColor
a vec4 value. The end color of the particle.
endSize
a float value. The end size of the particle

Updates all particles in the particle system, called once per frame.
dt
a float value. The delta time in seconds.
draw()

Draws all particles in the particle system, called once per frame, after update
update()
Handles all particles
